name: Into The Randomness
description:
Just like how Dr. Indianna Jones was hungry to retrieve all the

ancient gold and treasure, well.....now's your time to get all

that old stolen wealth from the bloomy mummy

he has over 100 years bred 2 deadly monsters

eyebsorber and poseton

eyesorber looks like an eye and takes away your vission when you come close

and poseton is mutant skeleson that can just touch and poison you!!!

Bloomy Mummy has made his dungeon as everytime you enter you need a gem to proceed

but there's a catch.....the dungeon is randomly made everytime!!

help the world to get back all that gold

W - UP

A -LEFT

S- RIGHT

D -DOWN

Left click - throw spear

right click - throw poison bottle

what do you say?
